title: naadhanu santhana
sahitya:
nAdAnu santAna natha(nu) nan mArgamE sanmArgam manamE



anupallavi



sItApati vEdAdhuti pAdAravinda paramAnanda kanda



caraNam



dEha ArOgyam dhrDha bhakti bhAgyam dhIrgAyuL sat santAna saubhAgyam

 vAgadIshvari vara krpAkaram tarum vara kavi kunjaradAsan tan
